title: Save Our Community Garden
description: Our neighborhood garden is threatened by new development plans. Sign to protect this green space, preserve biodiversity, and keep our community healthy.

title: Improve Neighborhood Street Lighting
description: Many streets lack adequate lighting, making evening walks unsafe. We’re asking the city to install LED lamps along Oak and Maple avenues.

title: Start a Weekly Community Cleanup
description: Let’s come together to keep our sidewalks and parks litter‑free. Sign here to launch a weekly volunteer cleanup event.
